suite.name: ZUP

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Busca, verificação e adição ao carrinho do item TV LG 4k OLED77C9PSB no site Megazine Luiza
Dado que acesso e verifico que estou no site Magazine Luiza
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

arguments.arg: Magazine Luiza | Pra você é Magalu!

kw.msg: Page title is 'Magazine Luiza | Pra você é Magalu!'.

kw.name: Quando é preenchido o campo de busca ${busca_produto}, verifico se o mesmo é retornado na lista
Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'TV LG 4k OLED77C9PSB' into text field 'id:inpHeaderSearch'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Set Focus To Element
kw.doc: Sets the focus to the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element '//ul[@class='neemu-products-container nm-view-type-grid five-products priceapi-finish']//h2[contains(text(),'Smart TV 4K OLED 77” LG OLED77C9PSB')]'.

kw.name: Então o produto o é adicionado e verificado que está no carrinho
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Sacola de compras - Magazine Luiza'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//p[contains(text(),'Smart TV 4K OLED 77” LG OLED77C9PSB Wi-Fi - Bluetooth HDR Inteligência Artificial 4 HDMI 3 USB ')]' contains exact text 'Smart TV 4K OLED 77” LG OLED77C9PSB Wi-Fi - Bluetooth HDR Inteligência Artificial 4 HDMI 3 USB'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc:
ZUP - AUTOMAÇÃO WEB Utilizando as ferramentas que preferir crie um teste automatizado que faça o fluxo de ponta a ponta de um cliente que:
3- Valide o retorno da busca 4- Escolha um produto na lista 5- Adicione o carrinho 6- Valide o produto no carrinho Para a criação dos cenários de testes devem ser considerados casos de sucesso e fluxos alternativos
